body:
Hey guys, i know that may sound weird but since I've been on the forums I've only ever been able to show photos through Imgur (links) not actually having the photo itself show on the discussion, so please, if anyone can tell me how i can directly get a photo on a discussion, please comment :)

Thanks guys, have a good weekend :)

title: How do you add photos to a discussion?

replies.body: While creating the thread, you'll notice a little picture box on the far right of your tools for editing text. Place the link of the picture you want people to see and it should display.
